title: Clear Dapple Dualies
paragraphs: The Clear Dapple Dualies are a main weapon in Splatoon 2. They are a Sheldon's Picks-branded variant of the Dapple Dualies.
The Clear Dapple Dualies share their builds with the Dapple Dualies. However, the Clear Dapple Dualies are mainly transparent with white and lime green toothbrushes.
The Clear Dapple Dualies were released on 3 April 2019 at 01:00 UTC as part of version 4.6.0.[1] They come with Torpedoes and the Splashdown.
For competitive tips about the Clear Dapple Dualies
- There are toothbrushes on the ends of the guns, likely referencing the fact that toothbrushes are used to make realistic splatter marks known as "dapples" on paintings.
